EmailTemplate.description: Notification is generated when system changes the GMPL Opportunity Association Request Status to 'Approved'
EmailTemplate.name: GMPL Opportunity Association: Send Reminder after Approval by PLM/PPM
EmailTemplate.subject: Please update GMPL/BX009 for GMPL Opportunity Association named '{!GMPL_Opportunity__c.Name}'.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi, The GMPL Opportunity Association named '{!GMPL_Opportunity__c.Name}' has been Approved by PLM/PPM. The GMPL Opportunity Association can be accessed via {!GMPL_Opportunity__c.Link}.
Thanks.
